TableCreationSql.string: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[aa_acc_usage]( [id_sess] [bigint] NOT NULL, [tx_UID] [varbinary](16) NOT NULL, [id_acc] [int] NOT NULL, [id_payee] [int] NOT NULL, [id_view] [int] NOT NULL, [id_usage_interval] [int] NOT NULL, [id_parent_sess] [bigint] NULL, [id_prod] [int] NULL, [id_svc] [int] NOT NULL, [dt_session] [datetime] NOT NULL, [amount] [numeric](22, 10) NOT NULL, [am_currency] [nvarchar](3) NOT NULL, [dt_crt] [datetime] NOT NULL, [tx_batch] [varbinary](16) NULL, [tax_federal] [numeric](22, 10) NULL, [tax_state] [numeric](22, 10) NULL, [tax_county] [numeric](22, 10) NULL, [tax_local] [numeric](22, 10) NULL, [tax_other] [numeric](22, 10) NULL, [id_pi_instance] [int] NULL, [id_pi_template] [int] NULL, [id_se] [int] NOT NULL, [div_currency] [nvarchar](3) NULL, [div_amount] [numeric](22, 10) NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_aa_acc_usage] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [id_sess] ASC, [id_usage_interval] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY], CONSTRAINT [C_aa_acc_usage] UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED ( [tx_UID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[aa_acc_usage] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [fk2_aa_acc_usage] FOREIGN KEY([id_payee]) REFERENCES [dbo].[t_account] ([id_acc])
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[aa_acc_usage] WITH CHECK ADD CONSTRAINT [fk3_aa_acc_usage] FOREIGN KEY([id_prod]) REFERENCES [dbo].[t_po] ([id_po])

CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [idx_acc_ui_view_ind] ON [dbo].[aa_acc_usage] ( [id_acc] ASC, [id_usage_interval] ASC, [id_view] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [idx_payee_ind] ON [dbo].[aa_acc_usage] ( [id_payee] ASC, [dt_session] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [parent_idx_t_acc_usage] ON [dbo].[aa_acc_usage] ( [id_parent_sess] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
